title: Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 4 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site Exhibit on African American Civil War Hero -- Robert Smalls      Location: Visitor Center Fees: free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 06/18/2016 to 10/30/2016 “The Life and Times of Congressman Robert Smalls” multifaceted exhibit includes visual displays, three-dimensional artifacts, pictures and other memorabilia of Robert Smalls, his life, and family. View Details      Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site NPS Centennial Band Concert      Time: 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM Location: Park Grounds Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Concert on the grounds of the park View Details      Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site Theatrical Performance - "Lift Every Voice"      Time: 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free but reservations are required.     Friday, August 26, 2016 Family friendly play to celebrate the National Park Service's Centennial and the many Black Americans who made a difference in the American Midwest. View Details      Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site Living History Program - "Grant or Greeley-Which? The Election of 1872"      Location: Park Grounds Fees: Free     Friday, September 9, 2016 Family-friendly weekend of free living history presentations, music, hands-on activities, displays, and much more.
